item.title: Hello World (again)
item.description:
Let’s see how many times in the next year I post something. I’ll put the over/under at 2.5, not including this one.

So, the setup I am currently using is:

  • Hover.com (domain registration)
  • Cloudflare (DNS)
  • Hugo (static site generator)
  • Github pages
